os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: NotifFlashlight
short_description:
App is available on the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.whd.notifflashlight

This Android Application ports one functionality from the iPhone (and other android phones who have it build in) to Android (API 5 or higher), only requirement for this is an Flashlight on your phone.

To work correctly, this App makes use of the Android Accessibility service, it will always run in the background but only do work when an Accessibility event is triggered.

Features:
+ Blink on new notification.
+ Control which apps it should blink for.
+ Control amount of flashes.
+ Control delay (time between flashes and on time of flash).


Important changes in Version 4;

-You have to choose which apps to blink for (everything is not allowed by default).

- Android 4 is now supported!

- Few UI changes
summary: Android Flash on Notification (like iPhone has)
